statements: SELECT event_name, event_date, tickets_sold FROM TicketSales WHERE event_date >= '2022-12-01'
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM TicketSales WHERE tickets_sold > 1000 ORDER BY event_name ASC
SELECT * FROM TicketSales WHERE tickets_sold BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY ticket_price DESC
SELECT event_name, SUM(tickets_sold) AS total_tickets, AVG(ticket_price) AS avg_price FROM TicketSales GROUP BY event_name
SELECT event_id, COUNT(event_name) AS num_events, MAX(tickets_sold) AS max_tickets FROM TicketSales GROUP BY event_id HAVING num_events > 1 ORDER BY num_events DESC
SELECT event_name, event_date, ticket_price FROM TicketSales WHERE tickets_sold > 100 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM TicketSales WHERE event_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_name, SUM(tickets_sold) AS total_tickets_sold, AVG(ticket_price) AS average_ticket_price FROM TicketSales GROUP BY event_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM TicketSales WHERE event_date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY ticket_price DESC, event_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT event_name, MIN(ticket_price) AS min_price, MAX(ticket_price) AS max_price FROM TicketSales;
SELECT * FROM concert_tickets WHERE ticket_price > 50
SELECT event_name, ticket_quantity FROM concert_tickets ORDER BY ticket_quantity DESC
SELECT attendee_name FROM event_attendees WHERE event_name = 'Music Festival'
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM concert_tickets WHERE ticket_quantity > 0 ORDER BY ticket_price ASC
SELECT DISTINCT event_name FROM event_attendees
SELECT * FROM concert_tickets WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY ticket_price DESC
SELECT event_name, ticket_quantity FROM concert_tickets WHERE event_name='Concert A'
SELECT * FROM concert_tickets WHERE ticket_quantity BETWEEN 1 AND 5
SELECT event_name, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets_sold FROM event_attendees GROUP BY event_name
SELECT attendee_id, event_name, attendee_name FROM event_attendees WHERE event_name='Concert B'
SELECT concert_name, venue_name, date, ticket_price FROM Concerts;
SELECT * FROM Tickets WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT concert_name, venue_name, date FROM Concerts ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT concert_name, venue_name, ticket_price FROM Concerts WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM Tickets JOIN Concerts ON Tickets.concert_id = Concerts.concert_id WHERE ticket_type = 'VIP';
SELECT ticket_id, quantity FROM Tickets WHERE quantity > 2 ORDER BY quantity DESC, ticket_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Tickets GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2);
SELECT * FROM Concerts;
SELECT concert_name, concert_date FROM Concerts WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT MAX(ticket_price) AS max_price FROM Concerts;
SELECT concert_name, ticket_holder_name FROM Concerts INNER JOIN Tickets ON Concerts.concert_id = Tickets.concert_id;
SELECT event_name, event_date, ticket_status FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Concerts WHERE concert_id = 1;
SELECT concert_name, concert_date FROM Concerts WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT ticket_holder_name, sale_amount FROM TicketSales INNER JOIN Tickets ON TicketSales.ticket_id = Tickets.ticket_id WHERE Tickets.concert_id = 2 AND Tickets.event_id = 3;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE ticket_price < 30 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT concert_name, COUNT(*) AS ticket_count FROM Tickets INNER JOIN Concerts ON Tickets.concert_id = Concerts.concert_id GROUP BY concert_name HAVING ticket_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM Concerts;
SELECT concert_name, concert_date FROM Concerts WHERE concert_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT artist_name, venue_name FROM Artists JOIN Venues ON Artists.artist_id = Venues.venue_id;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_price, ticket_status FROM Tickets WHERE ticket_price < 50.00 ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM Sales WHERE sale_amount > 100.00 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Concerts;
SELECT concert_name, concert_date FROM Concerts WHERE concert_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT artist_name, venue_name FROM Artists, Venues WHERE Artists.artist_id = 1 AND Venues.venue_id = 1;
SELECT t.ticket_price, s.sale_amount FROM Tickets t INNER JOIN Sales s ON t.ticket_id = s.ticket_id WHERE t.ticket_status = 'Sold';
SELECT v.venue_name, c.concert_name, s.sale_amount FROM Venues v, Concerts c, Tickets t, Sales s WHERE v.venue_id = t.venue_id AND c.concert_id = t.concert_id AND s.ticket_id = t.ticket_id;
